import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{connection,startConnection}from"../services/signalRConnection";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=_ref=>{let{onLoginSuccess}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState("");const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;const handleLogin=async()=>{if(!username||!password)return setError("Enter both username and password");setLoading(true);setError("");try{const res=await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/api/users/login"),{username,password});const user=res.data;// Store user in session storage
sessionStorage.setItem("currentUser",JSON.stringify(user));await startConnection();await connection.invoke("Login",user.id);onLoginSuccess(user);}catch(err){console.error(err);setError("Invalid username or password");}finally{setLoading(false);}};const handleKeyDown=e=>{if(e.key==="Enter")handleLogin();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-center h-screen bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-full max-w-md bg-white p-8 rounded-lg shadow-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-6 text-center text-gray-800",children:"ChatApp Login"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-red-500 mb-4",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"block text-gray-700 mb-2",children:"Username"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"w-full border border-gray-300 p-2 rounded focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500",placeholder:"Enter your username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),onKeyDown:handleKeyDown})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"block text-gray-700 mb-2",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",className:"w-full border border-gray-300 p-2 rounded focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500",placeholder:"Enter your password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),onKeyDown:handleKeyDown})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"w-full p-2 rounded text-white font-bold ".concat(loading?"bg-gray-400":"bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-600"),onClick:handleLogin,disabled:loading,children:loading?"Logging in...":"Login"})]})});};export default LoginPage;
